text: @piersmorgan @ChrisGiles_ Thank you for bringing this up & quoting @ChrisGiles_ work based on @ONS - how come the official site for coronavirus is counting over 35K today? It's two gov departments and there's not enough talk on these 20 thousand dead people's invisibility. #Covid19UK #ukedchat #teachers
